workflow.name: Enrich Monday.com leads & draft personalized emails with Explorium MCP and GPT-4.1
workflow.description:
# Enrich Monday.com leads with AI-powered company research and personalized email drafts using Explorium MCP and GPT-4.1

##  AI-Powered Lead Enrichment & Email Writer for Monday.com


## üöÄ Overview

**Stop losing deals to slow response times!**
 Transform your inbound leads into qualified opportunities with this intelligent workflow that automates lead enrichment and personalized outreach. When a new lead drops into your Monday.com board, magic happens:

* üîç **Deep-dives** into company data using Explorium MCP's advanced intelligence engine
* üß† **Analyzes** business priorities, pain points, and growth opportunities
* üí° **Identifies** specific AI automation use cases tailored to each company
* ‚úâÔ∏è **Crafts** hyper-personalized email drafts with GPT-4.1 (under 120 words!)
* üìä **Enriches** your CRM with actionable insights and AI solution recommendations
* üìß **Saves** draft emails directly to Gmail for your review
* üîÑ **Updates** Monday.com automatically with all the juicy insights

**Perfect for sales teams, growth marketers, and BizDev pros who want to turn every lead into a conversation starter that actually converts!**

## üë• Who's it for?

* B2B sales teams drowning in inbound leads
* Growth teams needing lightning-fast lead qualification
* BizDev professionals seeking that personal touch at scale
* Companies rocking Monday.com as their CRM

## ‚ö° How it works

1. **Webhook triggers** when fresh lead hits Monday.com
2. **Company Researcher agent** unleashes Explorium MCP for company intel
3. **Email Writer agent** crafts personalized outreach that doesn't sound like a robot
4. **CRM Enrichment agent** adds golden nuggets of AI recommendations
5. **Gmail integration** parks the draft in your inbox
6. **Monday.com updates** with all the enriched goodness

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Instructions

**Time to magic:** 20 minutes

**You'll need:**
* OpenAI API Key (for GPT-4.1)
* Explorium MCP API Key
* Monday.com API Token
* Gmail OAuth credentials
* Monday.com webhook setup

**Step-by-step:**
1. Import this template into your n8n instance
2. Hook up Monday.com webhook via "Respond to Webhook" node
3. Deactivate that "Respond to Webhook" node (important!)
4. Plug in your API credentials
5. Customize agent prompts with YOUR company's secret sauce
6. Match your Monday.com columns to the workflow
7. Test drive with a dummy lead
8. Hit activate and watch the magic! ‚ú®

## üìã Requirements

* Monday.com board with these columns: Company Name, Contact Name, Email, Comments
* Explorium MCP access (for that company intelligence gold)
* OpenAI API (GPT-4.1 model ready)
* Gmail account (where drafts go to shine)

## üé® Make it yours

* Tweak email tone - formal, casual, or somewhere in between
* Adjust research depth in Company Researcher
* Add your unique value props to agent prompts
* Connect more data sources for extra enrichment
* Hook up other CRMs (HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive)
* Add Slack alerts for hot leads üî•

## üí™ Why this rocks

**Real talk:** Manual lead research is SO 2023. While your competitors are still googling companies, you're already in their inbox with an email that mentions their latest funding round, understands their tech stack, and offers solutions to problems they didn't even know you could solve.

This isn't just another "Hi {{first_name}}" template. It's AI that actually gets context, writes like a human, and makes your prospects think "How did they know exactly what we need?"

**Results you can expect:**
* Faster lead response time
* Higher email open rates
* Actually useful CRM data (not just "interested in our product")
* Your sales team thanking you (seriously)

**Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è by:** [Elay Guez](https://www.linkedin.com/in/elay-g)

**Pro tip:** The more context you feed the AI agents about your business, the scarier-good the personalization gets. Don't hold back on those System Message customizations!

options.systemMessage:
=You are a research analyst helping a sales agent write a highly personalized inbound email. Your job is to generate a detailed research brief that explains:

1. **What the company does**
2. **What the recent business event is**, and why it's significant
3. **How Automation might reflect on the company‚Äôs priorities, pain points, or growth goals**
4. Any additional company or contact context that might be useful for crafting a relevant sales message

## Guidelines:
- Your response should be **detailed, structured, and accurate**
- You are writing **for another AI**, so don't hold back on context ‚Äî more is better
- You can assume the contact already  know about 82Labs and it's capabilities, and more interested in knowing how to improve his KPIs and company using it's services.
- Write in **natural language**, using clear, concise, informative sentences ‚Äî not marketing fluff or speculation
- Keep your tone objective and analytical
- Avoid repeating generic phrases like ‚Äúthe company is innovative‚Äù unless supported by facts

## Inputs:
- From user prompt
- From Explorium MCP tools

## Output Structure:
Return your findings in 2-3 clear paragraphs. The first paragraph should describe the **main use case to solve in the company in detail** and explain why it may be relevant. The second should summarize what the **company does** and any other useful GTM signals (size, growth stage, recent changes, priorities, etc.).

Now generate the research summary.

parameters.content:
## Reaserch Agent
This agent uses the [Explorium MCP](https://www.explorium.ai/mcp) and ChatGPT 4.1 to research the company and the contact

# AI Lead Enrichment for Monday.com with Explorium MCP and GPT-4.1

## Created by: [Elay Guez](https://www.linkedin.com/in/elay-g)

## Overview
This workflow automatically enriches company data when new leads are added to Monday.com and drafts personalized inbound emails suggesting AI solutions for every new lead.

## Features
- üîç **Company Research**: Uses [Explorium MCP](https://www.explorium.ai/mcp) for deep company intelligence
- ‚úâÔ∏è **Email Generation**: Creates personalized outreach with GPT-4.1
- üìä **CRM Enrichment**: Adds AI solution recommendations to your Monday.com board
- üöÄ **Fully Automated**: Triggers instantly when new leads arrive

## Quick Setup
1. **Connect** Monday.com Webhook using the "Respond to Webhook" node
2. **Deactivate** the "Respond to Webhook" node after connection
3. **Update** the context in System Messages for all AI Agents:
   - Your company name and services
   - Value proposition
   - Target market details
4. **Test** with a sample lead
5. **Activate** and enjoy automated lead enrichment! üéØ

## Requirements
- Monday.com board with lead data
- Explorium MCP API access
- OpenAI API key (GPT-4.1)
- Gmail account for drafts

options.systemMessage:
You are a B2B inbound email assistant.

Your task is to write a short, personalized inbound email for an inbound lead (under 120 words) that sells a solution specificly to the company. This email will be sent to a general marketing, growth, or data contact ‚Äî no specific prospect information is available.

## About 82Labs (Use as context ‚Äî DO NOT paste directly):
82 Labs delivers complex fullstack applications for web and mobile, powered by cutting-edge automation technologies including n8n and LangGraph. Official n8n lecturers with enterprise-grade expertise.

If relevant, you may mention that they can explore our website (https://www.82labs.io).

Dont forget to always end with a call to action in setting up some sort of call or meeting to talk further

## Instructions:
- Reference the event to establish relevance and timing
- Briefly describe what the company does (from the input)
- Weave in 82Labs‚Äôs value and how it is applicable to their business priorities
- Suggest two AI Agents/ AI powered solutions based on your knoleadge
- End with a warm, soft CTA
- Make it personal, write "Hi {first name}" instead of "Hello Team". fill in the first name
- The salesperson name is "Elay"
- Use the thinking tool

Now write the email.

parameters.content:

This agent uses ChatGPT 4.1 to draft a personal inbound email

## Trigger Workflow and Organize Data
Using Monday.com webhook

## CRM Enrichment Agent
This agent uses ChatGPT 4.1 to enrich Monday.com CRM

## Instructions:
- Briefly describe what the company does (from the input)
- Suggest two AI Agents/ AI powered solutions based on your knoleadge

Now write the CRM Enrichement summary

main.node: Add an update to an item - 2
Add an update to an item - 1

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.

generic.label: Creating Error Workflows in n8n
